channel.title: Warning: Java Virus's!
channel.description:
WARNING:
At any risk you may get virus's from webclients or clients!
some of Java Virus's contain Downloads of other virus programs!
I am providing a link that you should never trust!
if you trust this site, it will download a RAT virus steals passwords and views ur screen and may also control your desktop!
YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!

item.title: Warning: Java Virus's!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Of course, you go ahead and provide the link directly to the webclient. If you weren’t advertising, then you would have just told us the name of the server or their site. Go away faggot.

Read full topic
